longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  for at least 3 months from date of arrival.
Admission and Transit Restrictions:
- Admission refused to holders of non-biometric passports
  issued to nationals of Albania. 

Visa required.

Minors:
- Passengers of up to and including 15 years of age can enter
  with any identity document with a photo. 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination.  (SEE NOTE 43931) 
    NOTE 43931: Exempt are minors under 16 years of age.
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry.  (SEE NOTE 43931) 
    NOTE 43931: Exempt are minors under 16 years of age.



 Moldova (Rep
